fourth best published result.from sentence:
Results and Model Analysis
Sentiment Classification
To the best of our knowledge , we achieve the fourth best published result for the 5 - class classification task on this dataset .

comparable results.from sentence: For the binary classification task , we achieve comparable results with respect to the state - of - the - art ones .

consistently outperforms.from sentence:
Question Type Classification
( 1 ) Our result consistently outperforms all published neural baseline models , which means that C - LSTM captures intentions of TREC questions well .

close.from sentence: ( 2 ) Our result is close to that of the state - of - the - art SVM that depends on highly engineered features .
